Question
========
Given P(A) = 0.6, P(B) = 0.5, P(A ∩ B) = 0.4, compute P(A ∪ B).

Solution
========
Use addition rule for overlapping events: P(A ∪ B) = 0.6 + 0.5 − 0.4 = 0.7 (subtract overlap once to avoid double-counting).
